name: ArmExtendersItem
description: These bracers allows their wearer to stagger enemies for 3 rounds on the first hit they land in combat with thrown weapons.

name: BracersOfAbruptOnslaughtItem
description: These bracers grant the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Trickery skill checks. Whenever the wearer makes a sneak attack, it deals additional 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

enchant.name: BracersOfAbruptOnslaughtEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillThievery (descriptor: Competence)

name: BracersOfAnimalFuryItem
description: These bracers grant the wearer a +3 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls whenever the wearer is polymorphed.

name: BracersOfArchery
description: These bracers empower the wearer to use any bow with a +2 competence bonus on attack rolls and a +1 competence bonus on damage rolls.

name: BracersOfArcheryLesser
description: These bracers empower the wearer to use any bow with a +1 competence bonus on attack rolls.

name: BracersOfArmor1
description:
These bracers grant their wearer an armor bonus of +1, just as though they were wearing armor.
Like most bonuses, an armor bonus does not stack with armor bonuses from different sources, such as bonuses from wearing armor or from Mage Armor spell.

enchant.name: ArmorBonus1
effect: Add stat bonus 1 to AC (descriptor: Armor)

description:
These bracers grant their wearer an armor bonus of +2, just as though they were wearing armor.
Like most bonuses, an armor bonus does not stack with armor bonuses from different sources, such as bonuses from wearing armor or from Mage Armor spell.

enchant.name: ArmorBonus2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Armor)

name: BracersOfBalanceItem
description: The wearer of these bracers gets a +5 bonus to CMD and a +5 bonus to CMB. If the wearer was knocked prone, the wearer makes a Fortitude saving throw (DC 23), on a successful save the wearer is no longer prone.

enchant.name: BracersOfBalanceEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to AdditionalCMB (descriptor: UntypedStackable)
Add stat bonus 5 to AdditionalCMD (descriptor: UntypedStackable)

name: BracersOfBreachingItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these bracers confirms a critical hit, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 23) or become vulnerable to piercing damage for 2 rounds.

name: BracersOfDeflection
description: These bracers give the wearer a +2 deflection bonus to AC and the ability to cast the shield spell twice a day like a 5th level wizard.

enchant.name: Deflection2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: BracersOfDominanceItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these bracers confirms a critical hit with a two-handed weapon, the enemy must pass a Will saving throw (DC 24) or become unable to attack for 1 round.

name: BracersOfEldritchScholarItem
description: These +6 bracers of armor grant a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Arcana) and Use Magic Device skill checks.

enchant.name: ArmorBonus6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to AC (descriptor: Armor)

enchant.name: BracersOfEldritchScholarEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeArcana (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillUseMagicDevice (descriptor: Competence)

name: BracersOfHarmfulConversionItem
description:
Whenever the wearer of these bracers confirms a critical hit, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 29) or suffer from a random condition from the following list and become immune to another random condition from the same list for 2 rounds.
The condition list is

name: BracersOfHeavyHandItem
description: These bracers grant the wearer a +3 bonus on damage rolls with the off-hand weapon when dual wielding or wielding two-handed melee weapon (for example, a double weapon).

name: BracersOfMindBreakItem
description: These bracers of armor +4 increase the save DC against all Enchantment school spells they cast by 2.

enchant.name: ArmorBonus4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Armor)

name: BracersOfOverwhelmingVigorItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these bracers lands a hit while having full hit points, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 28) or be knocked prone for 2 rounds.

name: BracersOfRoughLandingItem
description: These bracers grant their wearer a +2 competence bonus to AC, attack and damage rolls against flying enemies.

name: BracersOfWizardItem
description: These bracers grant their wearer an armor bonus of +2, just as though they were wearing armor, and a +3 competence bonus on all Knowledge

enchant.name: ArmorBonus2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Armor)

enchant.name: BracersOfWizardEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to SkillKnowledgeArcana (descriptor: Competence)

name: ChaosScourgeItem
description: The wearer of these bracers of armor +8 automatically confirms critical hits against chaotic enemies. In addition, whenever the wearer of these bracers confirms a critical hit against chaotic enemy, the enemy suffers a -2 penalty to AC and all saving throws for 3 rounds.

enchant.name: ArmorBonus8
effect: Add stat bonus 8 to AC (descriptor: Armor)

name: CharonsTouch
description: These bracers grant their wearer an ability cast harm spell once per day, and greater false life spell twice per day.

name: ClearPurposeItem
description: These bracers allow their wearer to cast healing spells without provoking attacks of opportunity. They also grant a +2 bonus on Concentration checks.

name: GearsRuleItem
description:
The nanites inside the item provide the wearer with multiple abilities
Fermela

name: GoldenHallucinationBracersItem
description: These bracers grant its wearer a +1 bonus to Illusion school spells' DC, and a +2 bonus to saving throws against illusion school spells.

name: LegendaryBracersItem
description: These bracers grant their wearer a +5 deflection bonus to AC, a +5 natural armor enhancement bonus to AC, a +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws, and a +6 enhancement bonuses to all ability scores. It can only be equipped by the player character.

enchant.name: Deflection5
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

enchant.name: Charisma6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Charisma (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Intelligence6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Intelligence (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Wisdom6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Wisdom (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Strength6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Strength (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Dexterity6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Dexterity (descriptor: Enhancement)

enchant.name: Constitution6
effect: Add stat bonus 6 to Constitution (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: NegotiatorsBracersItem
description: These bracers grant its wearer a +4 bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting conditions and a +10 competence bonus on Persuasion skill checks when used for diplomacy.

enchant.name: NegotiatorsBracersEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to CheckDiplomacy (descriptor: Competence)

name: PhantomSlayersBracersItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these bracers hits their Studied Target for the first time, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 24) or become blinded for 3 rounds.

name: PlayersPhylacteryBracersItem
description: This item grants its wearer Deadly Magic ability. If the wearer already has Deadly Magic, it grants them two additional uses. In addition, once per day, whenever the wearer's health falls below 0, it is restored to a maximum. Can only be equipped by a Lich.

enchant.name: ArmorBonus5
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to AC (descriptor: Armor)

name: PlayersStartingBracersItem
description: These bracers grant the wearer a +1 luck bonus to AC and a +1 luck bonus to Reflex, Will, and Fortitude saving throw.

enchant.name: PlayersStartingBracersEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 1 to AC (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 1 to SaveFortitude (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 1 to SaveWill (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 1 to SaveReflex (descriptor: Luck)

name: RepellingBracersItem
description: The wearer of this bracers is under constant protection from anyone who is getting too touchy. They get a +4 bonus to AC against touch attacks, but also suffers a -4 penalty on their own touch attack rolls. If an enemy gets within a 5 feet radius from the wearer, they must pass a Will saving throw (DC 21) to push the enemy 5 feet away, or become frightened for one round.

name: RighteousExorcistsBracersItem
description: These bracers grant their wearer a +1 morale bonus on damage rolls against demons.

name: RubyPhoenixItem
display_name: Bracers of the Ruby Phoenix Champion
description: These bracers, just like bracers of archery, empower the wearer to use any bow with a +2 competence bonus on attack rolls and a +1 competence bonus on damage rolls. These bracers also grant an additional +1 bonus on all attacks rolls and damage rolls with Longbows.

name: StormlordsResolveItem
description: If the wearer of these bracers has the ability to cast spells spontaneously, it grants them the ability to cast the following spells

name: VeteranMarksmansBracersItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these bracers lands a hit with a ranged weapon on an enemy who is prone, stunned or staggered, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 23) or its current condition is prolonged for 1 round.
